# LocalDateTime

Returns current local timestamp including milliseconds.

### NAMESPACE

    xmlns:AS="http://schema.advantages.cz/AsapFunctions"

</div>
</div></td>
</tr>

### EXAMPLE

Example of returned value: `2018-03-27T16:33:07.9687449+02:00`
